name: Hopper Space
description:
When your spaceship breaks down, you must land on a nearby planet. Venture across these new locations, blasting enemies, collecting carrots, undoing locks, and serving cupcakes! Seek the hidden golden gear, set in the planets, and use them to repair your spaceship!

Keyboard + Controller input supported!

[THIS IS ONLY A DEMO! MORE FEATURES COMING SOON]
